original_text: And the Lord appeared unto him, and said, Go not down into Egypt; dwell in the land which I shall tell thee of:
korean_text: 여호와께서 이삭에게 나타나 이르시되 애굽으로 내려가지 말고 내가 네게 지시하는 땅에 거주하라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord appeared unto him,

sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 알려 줄 땅에 거주하라

sentences.original_text: which I shall tell thee of:
